thread.title: Traveller with Children
thread.title_full: Traveller with Children - Review of Hilton Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: r0yfisher
title: Traveller with Children
text: great place to be with subway access to everywhere, mall attached to hotel and across the way. Staff in every area is most helpful. Concierge assists all needs and the business area that used to be a dead area at the end of the One line of the subway is now alive due to a mall just outside the hotel with a movie theater and family restaurants plus large mall.
